resources.string: No places found, because location permission is disabled.

A Help Overview will be completely written on the completion of this app on this page. It will include an overview of what each tab/page does and any other significant info that I deem important for the user to know.

The database UI/this page will be completed when I begin working on the database because of as of right now I do not know what kind of data I want the user to enter or if its just going to be a button that the user clicks and it then sends data that the app stores.
The game UI/this page will be completed when I begin working on it as of right now I am not 100% exactly what the game will look like so right now all it gets is this TextView.
